data.eml:eml: A new species of Acroleptus Bourgeois (Coleoptera: Lycidae) from the Brazilian Amazonian rainforest, with a note on its homonymy with Acroleptus Cabanis (Aves)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferreira, Vinicius S. (2015): A new species of Acroleptus Bourgeois (Coleoptera: Lycidae) from the Brazilian Amazonian rainforest, with a note on its homonymy with Acroleptus Cabanis (Aves). Zootaxa 3949 (2): 297-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3949.2.10
